scriptedEmail.name: Media Comment Notify Owners Plugin
scriptedEmail.description: Sends an email media gallery owners when a comment is made on a file in the gallery.
scriptedEmail.bodyScript:
#set($commentAuthorUrl = false) #set($commentAuthorUrl = $context_v1_email.Context.Comment.User.Url)

#if ($commentAuthorUrl)
$core_v2_ui.GetResizedImageHtml($context_v1_email.Context.Comment.User.AvatarUrl, 32, 32, "%{ ResizeMethod='ScaleDown', ScaleFactor=2, OutputIsPersisted='True', width='32', height='32' }")
#else
$core_v2_ui.GetResizedImageHtml($context_v1_email.Context.Comment.User.AvatarUrl, 32, 32, "%{ ResizeMethod='ScaleDown', ScaleFactor=2, OutputIsPersisted='True', width='32', height='32' }")
#end 		#if ($commentAuthorUrl) $context_v1_email.Context.Comment.User.DisplayName #else $context_v1_email.Context.Comment.User.DisplayName #end

$context_v1_email.Context.Comment.Body('Email')

#format($core_v2_language.GetResource('Body_Status')) #token('status') #if ($context_v1_email.Context.Comment.IsApproved) $core_v2_language.GetResource('Status_Published') #else $core_v2_language.GetResource('Status_NotPublished') #end #end
scriptedEmail.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Body_NewComment">New comment on {media_name_link}</resource> <resource name="Body_Status">Status: {status}</resource> <resource name="FlagAsAbuse">Flag as spam/abuse</resource> <resource name="Footer">You received this notification because you are an owner of {gallery_name_link} and the gallery has been set to notify owners of comments on files.</resource> <resource name="Footer_FlagAsAbuse">{flag_as_abuse_link}.</resource> <resource name="Status_NotPublished">Not Published</resource> <resource name="Status_Published">Published</resource> <resource name="Subject">{gallery_name}: New Comment on {media_name}</resource> </language>
